content.body: For this particular proposal, I think I'd want to see host integration specified prior to stage 3. Off hand, this feels like ShadowRealms, where the host integration is a potential can of worms and it would be great to see the DOM side of things as soon as possible.
Since 2.7 signals ready for testing, and I'd want to see tests for DOM APIs as well, I think the host integration part needs to be specified prior to 2.7.
